title: Momo (Chicken)
description: Juicy steamed dumplings with spicy sauce
ingredients: All-purpose flour; Water; Ground chicken; Onion; Garlic; Ginger; Cilantro; Momo masala; Tomatoes; Sesame seeds; Chili
steps: Knead dough and let rest for 30 mins; Mix filling with chicken, onions, garlic, ginger; Fill and shape dumplings; Steam for 10-12 minutes; Blend tomatoes, sesame, chili for sauce

title: Dal Bhat Tarkari
description: Lentil soup with rice and vegetables
ingredients: Yellow lentils; Turmeric; Salt; Basmati rice; Potatoes; Cauliflower; Tomatoes; Cumin; Coriander
steps: Pressure cook lentils with turmeric for 15 mins; Cook rice separately; Saute cumin in oil; Add vegetables and cook; Serve together

title: Sel Roti
ingredients: Rice flour; Sugar; Mashed banana; Ghee; Cardamom; Oil for frying
steps: Soak rice overnight and grind into smooth batter; Add sugar, banana, cardamom; Ferment for 2 hours; Pour batter in ring shape into hot oil; Fry until golden brown

title: Aloo Tama
description: Curry with bamboo shoots and potatoes
ingredients: Potatoes; Fermented bamboo shoots; Onion; Garlic; Ginger; Turmeric; Cilantro
steps: Boil bamboo shoots to reduce sourness; Saute onion, garlic, ginger; Add turmeric and potatoes; Cook until tender; Garnish with cilantro

title: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice; Chicken; Yogurt; Biryani spices; Saffron; Fried onions; Mint; Ghee
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours; Parboil rice with whole spices; Layer rice and chicken; Sprinkle saffron milk and fried onions; Dum cook for 30 mins on low heat

title: Vegetable Momos
ingredients: All-purpose flour; Cabbage; Carrots; Onions; Garlic; Ginger; Soy sauce
steps: Make dough and rest; Finely chop vegetables; Season with soy sauce and spices; Fill and shape momos; Steam for 12 minutes

title: Butter Chicken
ingredients: Chicken; Butter; Cream; Tomatoes; Cashews; Garam masala; Kasuri methi
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt overnight; Grill chicken until charred; Make tomato-cashew gravy; Add butter and cream; Simmer chicken in gravy; Finish with kasuri methi

title: Thukpa
ingredients: Wheat noodles; Chicken; Mixed vegetables; Garlic; Ginger; Stock; Soy sauce
steps: Boil chicken stock with garlic and ginger; Cook noodles separately; Add vegetables to stock; Shred cooked chicken; Assemble bowls with noodles, broth, chicken

title: Paneer Tikka
ingredients: Paneer; Yogurt; Tikka masala; Bell peppers; Onions; Lemon
steps: Cut paneer into cubes; Marinate in yogurt and spices for 1 hour; Skewer with vegetables; Grill or bake at 200C for 15 mins; Serve with chutney

title: Chatamari
ingredients: Rice flour; Water; Minced meat; Egg; Onions; Cilantro; Spices
steps: Make thin rice batter; Heat griddle and pour batter; While cooking, add minced meat and egg on top; Cook until crispy; Garnish with onions and cilantro

title: Palak Paneer
ingredients: Fresh spinach; Paneer; Cream; Onion; Tomatoes; Garlic; Ginger; Garam masala
steps: Blanch spinach and puree; Saute onions, garlic, ginger; Add tomatoes and cook; Mix spinach puree; Add cubed paneer and cream; Simmer for 5 mins

title: Chicken Chow Mein
ingredients: Noodles; Chicken breast; Cabbage; Carrots; Bell peppers; Soy sauce; Oyster sauce
steps: Boil noodles until al dente; Stir-fry chicken strips; Add vegetables and cook; Toss in noodles; Add sauces and mix well

title: Samosa
ingredients: Flour; Potatoes; Peas; Spices; Oil for frying
steps: Make dough and rest; Boil and mash potatoes; Mix with peas and spices; Roll dough and fill; Shape into triangles; Deep fry until golden

title: Sekuwa
ingredients: Chicken or goat; Mustard oil; Spices; Garlic; Ginger; Puffed rice
steps: Cut meat into cubes; Marinate with mustard oil and spices for 4 hours; Skewer meat pieces; Grill over charcoal; Serve with puffed rice and pickle

title: Vegetable Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice; Mixed vegetables; Yogurt; Biryani spices; Saffron; Fried onions
steps: Parboil rice with spices; Cook vegetables separately; Layer rice and vegetables; Add saffron milk and fried onions; Dum cook for 25 mins

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: Chicken; Onions; Tomatoes; Curry spices; Garlic; Ginger; Oil
steps: Saute onions until golden; Add ginger-garlic paste; Add chicken and brown; Add tomatoes and spices; Simmer until chicken is tender; Garnish with cilantro

title: Aloo Gobi
ingredients: Potatoes; Cauliflower; Tomatoes; Turmeric; Cumin; Coriander; Ginger
steps: Cut vegetables into florets; Saute cumin and spices; Add potatoes and cauliflower; Cook with tomatoes; Simmer until tender

title: Fish Curry
ingredients: Fish fillets; Tomatoes; Onions; Turmeric; Chili; Mustard seeds; Curry leaves
steps: Marinate fish with turmeric; Saute mustard seeds and curry leaves; Add onions and tomatoes; Add fish and simmer gently; Cook until fish is done

title: Chole Bhature
ingredients: Chickpeas; Flour; Yogurt; Tomatoes; Spices; Oil
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight; Pressure cook with spices; Make dough with yogurt; Roll and deep fry bhature; Serve hot together

title: Chicken Fried Rice
ingredients: Cooked rice; Chicken; Eggs; Peas; Carrots; Soy sauce; Spring onions
steps: Scramble eggs and set aside; Stir-fry chicken pieces; Add vegetables; Toss in cold rice; Add soy sauce and eggs; Mix well

title: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Paneer; Butter; Cream; Tomatoes; Cashews; Spices
steps: Puree tomatoes and cashews; Saute in butter with spices; Add cream and simmer; Add paneer cubes; Cook for 5 mins; Garnish with cream

title: Egg Curry
description: Hard boiled eggs in spicy gravy
ingredients: Eggs; Onions; Tomatoes; Curry spices; Coconut milk
steps: Boil eggs and peel; Make onion-tomato gravy; Add curry spices; Add coconut milk; Add eggs and simmer; Serve with rice or roti

title: Kwati
ingredients: Mixed sprouted beans; Turmeric; Cumin; Ginger; Garlic; Fried garlic
steps: Soak 9 types of beans overnight; Sprout for 2 days; Pressure cook with spices; Temper with fried garlic and cumin; Simmer until thick

title: Chana Masala
ingredients: Chickpeas; Onions; Tomatoes; Garam masala; Amchur; Ginger; Garlic
steps: Soak and boil chickpeas; Saute onions and spices; Add tomatoes and cook; Add chickpeas and simmer; Finish with amchur powder; Garnish with cilantro

title: Gundruk ko Jhol
ingredients: Dried gundruk; Tomatoes; Onions; Garlic; Chili; Soy chunks
steps: Soak gundruk and rinse well; Boil with water; Saute tomatoes and onions; Add to gundruk water; Simmer for 15 mins; Add soy chunks if desired

title: Vegetable Pulao
ingredients: Basmati rice; Mixed vegetables; Whole spices; Ghee; Mint
steps: Saute whole spices in ghee; Add vegetables and cook; Add washed rice; Add water and cook; Garnish with mint and fried onions

title: Rajma
ingredients: Red kidney beans; Onions; Tomatoes; Ginger; Garlic; Spices
steps: Soak beans overnight; Pressure cook until soft; Make onion-tomato masala; Add beans and simmer; Mash some beans for thickness; Serve with rice

title: Choyla
ingredients: Buffalo or chicken; Mustard oil; Fenugreek; Turmeric; Chili; Ginger
steps: Grill meat until charred; Shred cooked meat; Marinate with mustard oil and spices; Let sit for 30 mins; Garnish with onions and cilantro

title: Mixed Vegetable Curry
ingredients: Potatoes; Carrots; Beans; Peas; Tomatoes; Spices
steps: Cut all vegetables; Saute with spices; Add tomatoes and cook; Add water and simmer; Cook until vegetables tender; Garnish with cilantro

title: Aloo Paratha
ingredients: Whole wheat flour; Potatoes; Spices; Ghee or butter
steps: Make dough and rest; Boil and mash potatoes with spices; Roll dough and fill with potato; Seal and roll again; Cook on griddle with ghee
